Make Agent

Source: R/agentFactory.R
makeAgent.Rd

Make Agent

makeAgent(name, env, conf = NULL)

Arguments

name

The name of the Agent
env

The environment to initialize the Agent
conf

The configuration

Value

[AgentArmed].

Examples

makeAgent("AgentDQN", makeGymEnv(name ="CartPole-v0"))
#> parameters: 
#> -render: - FALSE-
#> -agent.gamma: - 0.99-
#> -policy.maxEpsilon: - 1-
#> -policy.minEpsilon: - 0.001-
#> -policy.decay: - 0.999000499833375-
#> -replay.memname: - Uniform-
#> -replay.epochs: - 1-
#> -interact.maxiter: - 500-
#> -policy.epi_wait_ini: - 100-
#> -policy.epi_wait_expl: - 20-
#> -console: - FALSE-
#> -log: - FALSE-
#> -policy.name: - EpsilonGreedy-
#> -replay.batchsize: - 64-
#> -agent.nn.arch: nhidden- 64-
#>  -agent.nn.arch: act1- relu-
#>  -agent.nn.arch: act2- linear-
#>  -agent.nn.arch: loss- mse-
#>  -agent.nn.arch: lr- 0.00025-
#>  -agent.nn.arch: kernel_regularizer- regularizer_l2(l=0.0)-
#>  -agent.nn.arch: bias_regularizer- regularizer_l2(l=0.0)-
#> <AgentDQN>
#>   Inherits from: <AgentArmed>
#>   Public:
#>     act: function (state) 
#>     actCnt: 2
#>     advantage: NULL
#>     afterEpisode: function (interact) 
#>     afterStep: function () 
#>     brain: SurroNN, Surrogate, R6
#>     buildConf: function () 
#>     calculateTDError: function (ins) 
#>     clone: function (deep = FALSE) 
#>     conf: Conf, R6
#>     continue: function (new_env, iter) 
#>     createInteract: function (rl.env) 
#>     env: EnvGym, Environment, R6
#>     epochs: 1
#>     evaluateArm: function (state) 
#>     extractTarget: function (i) 
#>     gamma: 0.99
#>     getXY: function (batchsize) 
#>     getYhat: function (list.states.old) 
#>     glogger: RLLog, R6
#>     initialize: function (env, conf = NULL) 
#>     initializeConf: function (conf = NULL) 
#>     initializeEnv: function (env) 
#>     interact: Interaction, InteractionBase, R6
#>     learn: function (iter) 
#>     list.acts: NULL
#>     list.replay: NULL
#>     loginfo: function (str, ...) 
#>     mem: ReplayMemUniform, ReplayMem, R6
#>     model: SurroNN, Surrogate, R6
#>     observe: function (state.old, action, reward, state.new, done, info, episode, 
#>     p.next: NULL
#>     p.old: NULL
#>     policy: PolicyEpsilonGreedy, Policy, R6
#>     random.action: NULL
#>     random.cnt: 0
#>     replay: function (batchsize) 
#>     replay.size: 64
#>     replay.x: NULL
#>     replay.y: NULL
#>     sampleRandomAct: function (state) 
#>     setAdvantage: function (adv) 
#>     setBrain: function () 
#>     setConf: function (conf) 
#>     stateCnt: NULL
#>     stateDim: 4
#>     updatePara: function (name, val) 
#>     vec.arm.q: 0 0
#>     yhat: NULL
